content: Hello Abhay! It's nice to meet you. How can I assist you today?

Elon Musk is a South African-born entrepreneur, inventor, and business magnate. He is the CEO and CTO of SpaceX, CEO and product architect of Tesla Inc., and co-founder of Neuralink and The Boring Company.
